title: Mafia Graves in team builder  [CLIENT]
body:
There seems to be a small problem at the moment where the skin for Graves "Mafia Graves" won't appear in the team builder lobby. 
I get this every time i try to play him with the mafia skin

replies.body:
Hey there! 

I'm not seeing this issue on my end. Were you with a group when you were trying to select this?
